directions: In a skillet combine all the ingredients and stir
Over medium to low heat cook for 30 minutes stirring frequently
Serve over mashed potatoes or other starch
6473.ingredients:
1 whole
                            - bell pepper julienned
 2 tablespoons
                            - black pepper 
 2 cans
                            - cajun style tomatos 
 3 stalks
                            - celery diced
 2 tablespoons
                            - garlic minced from jar
 2 tablespoons
                            - kosher salt 
 1 whole
                            - red onion diced
 1 teaspoon
                            - red pepper flakes 
 1 pound
                            - round steak cubed
6473.title: Swiss Steak

directions: In a skillet, heat oil over medium heat. Add onions; cook until soft.
Add garlic, chili powder and peppercorns; cook, stirring, for 1 minute.
Add chili sauce, brown sugar, vinegar, Worcestershire sauce and liquid smoke.
Stir to combine; bring to a boil.
Place pork in slow cooker; pour sauce over pork. Cover and cook on LOW for 10 to 12 hours or on HIGH for 6 hours, until pork is falling apart.
Transfer pork to a cutting board; pull the meat apart in shreds,
using two forks.
Return to sauce and keep warm.
When ready to serve, spoon shredded pork and sauce over warm buns.

                            - cider vinegar

                            - garlic minced in jar

                            - heinz 57 sauce

                            - kaiser rolls

                            - liquid smoke 
 4 pound
                            - pork shoulder butt
 1 tablespoon
                            - vegetable oil 
 1 large
                            - white onion chopped
 1 tablespoon
                            - worcestershire sauce
7779.title: Crockpot Pulled Pork

directions: Hard boil the eggs
Halve the 7 eggs lengthwise and remove the yolks
Place the yolks in a small bowl and mash them
Stir in the mayonnaise, pickle relish, and mustard
Add salt and pepper to taste
Fill egg whites with the yolk mixture garnish with cayenne pepper

2 teaspoon
                            - black pepper

                            - cayenne pepper

                            - eggs large
 1/4 cup
                            - mayonnaise 
 1 teaspoon
                            - mustard 
 1 teaspoon
                            - salt 
 1 1/2 teaspoons
                            - sweet pickle relsih
